channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: US DoJ accuses FTX founder of leaking private diary of Caroline Ellison
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried attempted to publicly discredit government witness Caroline Ellison, who was once his business ally and a romantic partner, the DoJ argued.

item.title: Bitcoin Bollinger Bands echo move that ended in 40% January gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price should put in a “strong” reaction now that Bitcoin Bollinger Bands are at their most compact since the start of 2023.

item.title: Dota 2, Rocket League pros ‘want to explore’ Web3 and blockchain gaming
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Professional Dota 2 player Erik “Tofu” Engel believes that Web3 has very beneficial features for gamers.

item.title: US Justice Department to double its crypto team, target ransomware crimes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team, established in 2021, will be merged with the Computer Crime and Intellectual Property Section.

item.title: Bitcoin no longer asset of choice for criminals — former Elliptic crypto adviser
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Criminals have moved away from using Bitcoin for money laundering, with stablecoins emerging as an alternative due to accessibility.

item.title: Digital yuan integration introduced to Chinese business air travel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The Civil Aviation Administration and China Merchants Bank said passengers can utilize the central bank digital currency to access new services via this platform.

item.title: US state agency issues alert on crypto fraud happening over social media
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Vermont issued the investor alert after a 74-year-old man lost his life savings of over $340,000 in a crypto fraud orchestrated over Instagram and Telegram.

item.title: Indonesia launches its crypto exchange and clearing house
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The platform, monitored by local regulators, will be the only space in the country where the legal exchange of digital assets is allowed.

item.title: Canadian police warn crypto investors on growing home robbery trend
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.category: Richmond RCMP Major Crime Unit. Delta Police Investigative Services. Robbery
item.description: Perpetrators have impersonated delivery drivers in order to break into the homes of victims to steal cryptocurrency.

item.title: UK banks risk losing licenses for debanking customers over political views
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The British government may impose tighter freedom of speech protections on banking permits following a public dispute between Nigel Farage and Coutts bank.

item.title: Solana records 1 outage in first half of 2023, 100% uptime in Q2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Solana network is seeing steady improvements in performance and reliability as outages become more infrequent.

item.title: Coin Center and Blockchain Association slam ‘unworkable’ US Senate DeFi bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Coin Center said the bill was unconstitutional, while the Blockchain Association called it incompatible with blockchain technology.

item.title: Stablecoin dominance slides as market cap falls to near 2-year lows: CCData
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: After 16 consecutive months of decline, the stablecoin market dominance has fallen to 10.3% of the total crypto market capitalization.

item.title: FTX sues Sam Bankman-Fried and other former execs to claw back $1B
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Former FTX and Alameda Research executives Sam Bankman-Fried, Caroline Ellison, Gary Wang and Nishad Singh were named in the suit from FTX.

item.title: US House Republican committee members introduce joint digital assets bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The House Agriculture and Financial Services Committees have been working together all year on a bill to rival Lummis and Gillibrand’s Responsible Financial Innovation Act.

item.title: Hackers compromise Uniswap founder’s Twitter account to promote scam
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Hayden Adams’ account released a tweet encouraging its more than 254,000 followers to click on a malicious link, falsely claiming that users’ tokens were at risk.

item.title: OpenAI launches ‘custom instructions’ for ChatGPT so users don’t have to repeat themselves in every prompt
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The new feature is now available in beta for Plus users outside the EU and U.K., with a full rollout expected in the coming weeks.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: FTX sues over investments, donations made by charity arm to life sciences companies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The money was intended to add to Bankman-Fried’s political influence and goodwill and did not benefit FTX or Alameda Research.

item.title: Former Binance​.US CEO joins Hashdex board
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Brian Brooks has worked as Coinbase’s chief legal officer, acting comptroller of the currency, CEO of Binance.US and CEO of Bitfury.

item.title: Terraform Labs seeks access to FTX wallets in fraud defense
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Terraform filed a motion to access information from wallets used by short sellers during the collapse of its algorithmic stablecoin in 2022.

item.title: XRP price can fall 40% by September — Fractal analysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: XRP is currently mirroring a trend from April–June 2021 that preceded the price falling by 65% in the following months.

item.title: UK financial watchdog announces launch of permanent Digital Sandbox in August
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to the FCA, the sandbox will be open to businesses, startups and data providers, including those involved in banking, investment, lending and payments.

item.title: Bitcoin rejects at 21-day trendline — How low can BTC price go?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price fails to protect the $30,000 mark after a brief resurgence, and Bitcoin traders are not confident of new highs.

item.title: Aptos’ new user growth hits 900% after integration with social media app Chingari
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Chingari started the migration to Aptos in July, seeking an enhanced experience for users following Solana’s network outages in 2022.

item.title: 7 most in-demand programming languages to learn
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Stay ahead of the curve and develop in-demand programming skills with seven sought-after programming languages, including Python, Solidity, Rust and more.

item.title: 16 tips to help blockchain companies refine their marketing messages
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Blockchain companies aren’t just selling themselves; they’re also selling the industry’s technology and principles as a whole.

item.title: US law protects institutions and exposes retail investors — Rep. Torres
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: New York Representative Ritchie Torres had an exclusive interview with Cointelegraph to discuss why retail investors are still at risk following the XRP court ruling.

item.title: Liquid staking claims top spot in DeFi: Binance report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A Binance spokesperson highlighted that there are things to be wary of when liquid staking, including smart contract vulnerabilities, slashing risks and price fluctuations.

item.title: Wolf Of All Streets worries about a world where Bitcoin hits $1M: Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Former globe-trotting DJ Scott Melker — The Wolf Of All Streets — worries about the circumstances leading to Bitcoin topping $1 million.
